alert.note: Alert for Reynolds (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 9:04AM CDT until May 07 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Black River near Annapolis. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black River near Annapolis. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, County Road 372 will begin flooding near this height. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 AM CDT Friday the stage was 8.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:15 AM CDT Friday was 9.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 8.6 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg 7 am Sat Sun Mon Tue Wed Black River Annapolis 8.0 8.5 8.9 6.9 6.1 5.7 5.5 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
